description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6m in depth, maximum height of 3m and eaves height of 3m)
decision_conditions: The total depth of the  proposed single storey rear extension (taking into account previous extensions)  would exceed the 6m depth parameter for a prior approval notification and therefore would conflict with Paragraph A.1 (g) (i) Part 1, Schedule 2 of the  Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

While the submitted drawings show that the bricks and render would be of a similar form and size to those of the existing dwelling, it has not been demonstrated that they would be of a similar colour and finish. The submitted application form does not provide further detail nor clarity on the materials to be  used. The applicant is expected to explicitly demonstrate and/or state that the materials would be similar to those of the existing dwelling. In the absence of such confirmation, it has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Condition A.3 (a) (materials used in any exterior work shall be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the  Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
